article_title: John Nichols: Gene Farley's building of a better world
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy in the morning, then thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 81F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms, especially in the evening. Low near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , canada, tommy douglas, gene farley, john nichols, linda farley, farley center for peace, justice and sustainability, national health care
article_metadata.author: JOHN NICHOLS | The Capital Times | jnichols@madison.com

og.description: Dr. Gene Farley, who died Friday at 86, spent decades working with his late wife Linda for national health care and to build a better world.
